customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
Negative on: filter
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Post a message with a unique word (ex. foobarbaz)
  2. Search for the unique word and with a filter of "on:TODAYS_DATE" (TODAYS_DATE should be selected via the date picker).
  3. Search for the unique word with a negative filter of "-on:TODAYS_DATE" (TODAYS_DATE should be selected via the date picker).
inline.expectedResult:
• On step 2, search results that include the post with your unique word.
  • On step 3, search results should not include your new post.

customFields.Related ticket(s):
• (Story) Search: Exclude results containing specific words — MM-11359
  • Negative search filters can lead to incorrect highlighting of search results — MM-19487
  • Desktop: Unread count changes after opening quick switcher — MM_15918
